author: cnbc.com
title: Northrop Grumman Acquisition of Orbital ATK Approved by European Commission
text:
FALLS CHURCH, Va., Feb. 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The European Commission has notified Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE:NOC) that it has approved Northrop Grumman's acquisition of Orbital ATK (NYSE:OA). Northrop Grumman continues to support the U.S. Federal Trade Commission's review of the acquisition.
Northrop Grumman is a leading global security company providing innovative systems, products and solutions in autonomous systems, cyber, C4ISR, strike, and logistics and modernization to customers worldwide. Please visit news.northropgrumman.com and follow us on Twitter, @NGCNews , for more information.

These forward-looking statements speak only as of the date when made, and the Company undertakes no obligation to update or revise any forward-looking statements after the date of this press release except as required by applicable law. A discussion of these risks and uncertainties is contained in the Company’s filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
